body.subject: Deployment.json ready - requires implementation.json and code for unblocking
body.summary: Deployment.json created with full deployment plan, but Epic 28 blocked by quality veto. For unblocking requires: implementation.json with code_refs, code implementation per plan.json, test_evidence (coverage >= 80%, integration tests, smoke tests), security tests, performance tests. After passing quality gates deployment will be ready.
key_points: Deployment.json created: deployment strategy (staging → canary → production), rollback plans, monitoring setup
1. implementation.json with description of implemented tasks and code_refs
2. Code implemented per plan.json (8 workstreams, 18 tasks)
3. Test_evidence: pytest coverage >= 80%, integration tests pass, smoke tests pass for all 5 skills
4. Security tests: input sanitization for all entry points (Telegram messages, voice transcripts, CLI commands)
5. Performance tests: < 150ms memory retrieval, < 5s intent routing, < 30s multi-step flows
6. Layer boundary validation: automated checks in CI
Deployment readiness checklist in deployment.json defines all requirements
Monitoring setup ready: Prometheus metrics (6 metrics), Grafana dashboards (3), alerts (7), health checks (2)
concerns: Deployment blocked until code implementation and quality gates passed
All skills must be stateless adapters - no data migration needed
Domain entities pure Python - no database schema changes
Memory repository extends Day 25 - MongoDB schema compatible (new fields optional)
Performance targets - hard requirements (AC5: < 150ms, AC2: < 5s, plan.json: < 30s)
body.action_needed: Implement code per plan.json (8 workstreams, 18 tasks). Create implementation.json with code_refs. Write tests (coverage >= 80%, integration, smoke, performance, security). After passing quality gates (release_gate: true) deployment will be unblocked. DevOps ready for deployment after quality approval.
